text: @RealJamesWoods 30 Jan- cruise ship 6000 people docked at Italy- coronavirus found then - this is how it is ‘jumping’

domain.name: Person
domain.description: Named people in the world like Nelson Mandela

domain.name: Actor
domain.description: An actor or actress in the world, like Kate Winslet or Leonardo DiCaprio

domain.name: Entities [Entity Service]
domain.description: Entity Service top level domain, every item that is in Entity Service should be in this domain

domain.name: Interests and Hobbies Category
domain.description: A grouping of interests and hobbies entities, like Novelty Food or Destinations

entity.name: Italy records first coronavirus death after a spike in cases
entity.description: According to Italian media, a person has died after at least 14 people in the region of Lombardy and two in the nearby region of Veneto were confirmed to be infected with the virus.

entity.name: Fears of a global coronavirus pandemic as cases of reported infections surge
entity.description: A rapid surge of new coronavirus cases outside of China, including in Iran, South Korea and Italy, has prompted concerns among infectious disease experts and scientists that the contagion could transform into a global pandemic. The virus had spread to at least 28 countries with more than 76,000 confirmed cases worldwide.
